column1: What did you think about the use of VR and the stories because I know you watched it at the doctor and at home so what like stood out to you about these stories?
It's OK. Was there anyone that you liked more than the other?
Do you think there's like benefits of using VR for children?
My teachers, and...(It might take her mind off of it?) ... not sure...
So you said that it'll help take your mind off it and help people learn? Yeah, can you see any harms? Or like any bad things about using VR for kids?
On the hospital. I think not exercising and doing the videos instead of the exercise...It's bad.
Yeah, for sure. Do you think that might create some problems like for other kids, too?
Yeah. Can you give some examples?
To stay there for a really long time.
Who would you think decide in which VR experiences?
When people are creating different VR experiences for children, is there anything you think they should keep in mind?
Should make sure to do the things you're told before?
Yeah, for sure. Was there anything about your experience that you want to share?
Anything else you want to talk about? No. Okay. Thank you so much for your time.
